sourcesContent:
import * as Clipboard from 'expo-clipboard';
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react";
import { RefreshControl, Alert, View, Text } from 'react-native';
import { Container, DataContent, DataLab, DataReplyLab, DataLimiter, Copy, CopyLab,  Copied, CopiedLab } from "./styles/show";

const ShowCliente = ({ route, navigation }) => { 

  return (
  <Container>
    <DataLimiter>    
      <DataLab> Codigo: <DataReplyLab onPress={async () => await Clipboard.setString(route.params.cod) }> {route.params.cod} </DataReplyLab> </DataLab>
      <DataLab> Nome: <DataReplyLab onPress={async () => await Clipboard.setString(route.params.nome) }> {route.params.nome} </DataReplyLab> </DataLab>
      <DataLab> Apelido: <DataReplyLab onPress={async () => await Clipboard.setString(route.params.apelido) }> {route.params.apelido} </DataReplyLab> </DataLab>
      <DataLab> Numero: <DataReplyLab onPress={async () => await Clipboard.setString(route.params.numero) }> {route.params.numero} </DataReplyLab> </DataLab>
      <DataLab> Endreço: <DataReplyLab onPress={async () => await Clipboard.setString(route.params.endereco) }> {route.params.endereco} </DataReplyLab> </DataLab>
      <DataLab> Bairro: <DataReplyLab onPress={async () => await Clipboard.setString(route.params.bairro) }> {route.params.bairro} </DataReplyLab> </DataLab>
      <DataLab> Cidade: <DataReplyLab onPress={async () => await Clipboard.setString(route.params.cidade) }> {route.params.cidade} </DataReplyLab> </DataLab>
      <DataLab> Estado: <DataReplyLab onPress={async () => await Clipboard.setString(route.params.uf) }> {route.params.uf} </DataReplyLab> </DataLab>
      <DataLab> CEP: <DataReplyLab onPress={async () => await Clipboard.setString(route.params.cep) }> {route.params.cep} </DataReplyLab> </DataLab>
      <DataLab> Complemento: <DataReplyLab onPress={async () => await Clipboard.setString(route.params.complemento) }> {route.params.complemento} </DataReplyLab> </DataLab>           
      <DataLab> Tipo: <DataReplyLab onPress={async () => await Clipboard.setString(route.params.tipo) }> {route.params.tipo} </DataReplyLab> </DataLab>           
      <DataLab> Situação: <DataReplyLab onPress={async () => await Clipboard.setString(route.params.situacao) }> {route.params.situacao} </DataReplyLab> </DataLab>           
      <DataLab> Telefone(1): <DataReplyLab onPress={async () => await Clipboard.setString(route.params.telefone1) }> {route.params.telefone1} </DataReplyLab> </DataLab>           
      <DataLab> Telefone(2): <DataReplyLab onPress={async () => await Clipboard.setString(route.params.telefone2) }> {route.params.telefone2} </DataReplyLab> </DataLab>           
      <DataLab> Telefone(3): <DataReplyLab onPress={async () => await Clipboard.setString(route.params.telefone3) }> {route.params.telefone3} </DataReplyLab> </DataLab>           
      <DataLab> Celular: <DataReplyLab onPress={async () => await Clipboard.setString(route.params.celular) }> {route.params.celular} </DataReplyLab> </DataLab>
      <DataLab> Email: <DataReplyLab onPress={async () => await Clipboard.setString(route.params.email) }> {route.params.email} </DataReplyLab> </DataLab>
      <DataLab> RG: <DataReplyLab onPress={async () => await Clipboard.setString(route.params.rg) }> {route.params.rg} </DataReplyLab> </DataLab>
      <DataLab> CPF: <DataReplyLab onPress={async () => await Clipboard.setString(route.params.cpf) }> {route.params.cpf} </DataReplyLab> </DataLab>          
      <DataLab> Data de Cadastro: <DataReplyLab onPress={async () => await Clipboard.setString(route.params.data_cadastro) }> {route.params.data_cadastro} </DataReplyLab> </DataLab>           
      <DataLab> Observações: <DataReplyLab onPress={async () => await Clipboard.setString(route.params.obs1 + route.params.obs2 + route.params.obs3 + route.params.obs4 + route.params.obs5 + route.params.obs6) }> {route.params.obs1} {route.params.obs2} {route.params.obs3} {route.params.obs4} {route.params.obs5} {route.params.obs6} </DataReplyLab> </DataLab>
      <DataLab> Consumidor Final: <DataReplyLab onPress={async () => await Clipboard.setString(route.params.consumidor_final) }> {route.params.consumidor_final} </DataReplyLab> </DataLab>         
      <DataLab> ATB: <DataReplyLab onPress={async () => await Clipboard.setString(route.params.atb) }> {route.params.atb} </DataReplyLab> </DataLab>
      </DataLimiter>
      <Copy onPress={async () => await Clipboard.setString(
        		'Código : ' + route.params.cod + 
            '\n\nNome : ' + route.params.nome + 
            '\n\nApelido : ' + route.params.apelido + 
            '\n\nNumero : ' + route.params.numero +
            '\n\nEndereço : ' + route.params.endereco + 
            '\n\nBairro : ' + route.params.bairro + 
            '\n\nCidade : ' + route.params.cidade + 
            '\n\nUF : ' + route.params.uf +
            '\n\nCEP : ' + route.params.cep +  
            '\n\nComplemento : ' + route.params.complemento + 
            '\n\ntelefone1 : ' + route.params.telefone1 + 
            '\n\ntelefone2 : ' + route.params.telefone2 +
            '\n\ntelefone3 : ' + route.params.telefone3 +  
            '\n\nCelular : ' + route.params.celular + 
            '\n\nEmail : ' + route.params.email + 
            '\n\nRG : ' + route.params.rg +
            '\n\nCPF : ' + route.params.cpf +
            '\n\nData de Cadastro : ' + route.params.data_cadastro + 
            '\n\nObservações : ' + route.params.obs1 + route.params.obs2 + route.params.obs3 + route.params.obs4 + route.params.obs5 + route.params.obs6 +
            '\n\nConsumidor Final : ' + route.params.consumidor_final +		
            '\n\nATB : ' + route.params.atb) }>
      <CopyLab> Copiar </CopyLab>
      </Copy>
  </Container>
  )

}

export default ShowCliente;
